website_summaries.verdict: A lash primer from a top-selling brand that has earned happy customers thanks to its beauty benefits.
pros: Earns praise for reducing the number of coats of mascara needed after using
Conditions lashes while defining and separating them
Often used on professional photo shoots
cons: The plastic brush is awkward to use and has pointy bristles

customer_reviews.title: longer looking lashes w this primer
customer_reviews.text: makes lashes look longer. Like light white tint to be able to see on lashes but not so white as to show through. I use so much less mascara now & have more distinct lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Justaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Yes, It Really is an Improvement
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the new packaging and brush, I was convinced I didn't like it. (I tend to resist change!). However, I decided to give it a fair chance, took the brush out and actually looked at it under a magnifying glass. When I saw how the bristles on the brush were arranged, I realized that it actually improved the functionality of the brush and assisted me in customizing the look I wanted for my lashes. Now I wouldn't want it any other way.
customer_reviews.author: SashaLyn

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend the Smash Box Photo Finish Eyelash Primer
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Smash Box eyelash primer in the past and never had a problem with it. But this version of it is terrible. I very much dislike the plastic brush. It has two sections - one to apparently apply the primer, and the other, long bristles, to separate the lashes. But I am constantly poking myself in the eye, trying to get close enough to my lashes. And the plastic bristles do not hold enough primer to adequately brush onto my eyelashes. If I hadn't thrown out the box, I would definitely be returning it. Needless to say, I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at all of the great reviews and am wondering if I received a fake. This is by far the worst lash primer I have ever used. Six hours after applying, my mascara is nearly gone off of my lower lashes. In fact, my mascara stays on better if I don't apply this at all. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Let dry a couple of minutes before applying mascars
customer_reviews.text: I love the primer. I only use one coat of mascara stead of 4 or 5
customer_reviews.author: Noma

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite mascara primer. Was excited to find such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say that I like the product
customer_reviews.text: The brush isn't flexible at all! Sorry to say that I like the product, but not the brush to put it on with at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Kreiling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have this and I love it. It makes my lashes longer. I got some for my sister and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Good results with little effort.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it before I bought it. My eye lashes are thick, but somewhat short. This primer gives me length. In fact my eye lashes look twice as long. I tried similar primers before, and I had trouble covering them with mascara afterwards. I would have to apply few layers of mascara, but could still see white spots here and there. I don't have this problem with Smashbox primer. It took just one application of mascara to cover everything. It works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: vessna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell this did anything at all except make my eyelashes white. Also, for some odd reason, it made my eyes sting. Expensive and not what I expect from Smashbox.
customer_reviews.author: TexT

customer_reviews.title: Smoothed lashes
customer_reviews.text: Best product EVER. My lashes look better, mascara goes on smoother and lashes look longer. I bought this for all of my friends for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: I was under the impression that the primer would help ...
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that the primer would help me achieve a “longer looking” eyelash but I can do that by just using my mascara in several coats.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this product wish was larger and a little less in cost ....but nice primer.
customer_reviews.author: QHeatherB

customer_reviews.title: Makes your lashes look long!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I love how it works under my mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Franzen0424

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is bomb! Won't put my make up on without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good lash primer. Has lasted longer than many others I have purchased so it is a good value
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see any difference with it on or without it. Very disappointed. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Good primer makes a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this primer for over 5 years. My mascara goes on smoother and lashes look thicker and longer if I use this first. Without the prime my lashes look dull, thin and my mascara doesn't look as dark.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous long lashes without falsies.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I first tried it because I got a sample in a smashbox kit. It works great. I already have decent lashes. Then when I put the primer on it makes my lashes look super long and beautiful. No need for false lashes when you can use this. In my photo, one side is just mascara, the other is mascara with the primer on first. Big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

product_meta.title: Smashbox Photo Finish Lash Primer Base # Pour 0.30 Ounce
product_meta.description:
WHAT IS IT?
Mascara always looks better with primer!

From the primer authority, our first ever 10-in-1 lash primer for the amped-up lashes of your dreams. Perfected on photo shoots to condition and lift lashes to new heights, our for...
Amped-up volume
Fullest length exposed
Lifts lashes to new heights
Makes mascara last longer
Defines & separates
Conditions
Layerable for extra drama
Improves wear of mascara
Non-spiking
Non-clumping
feature_bullets: A 10-in-one mascara primer for amped-up lashes.
Amp up your mascara with Photo Finish Lash Primer.
Perfected on photo shoots to condition and lift lashes to new heights

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
